mapper.insert: insert into ea_faq (Ef_NUM, ef_cate, Ef_ADMIN, Ef_SUB, Ef_CONT, EF_FILE, EF_ORIGINAL, EF_DATE) values (EA_FAQ_SEQ.nextval, #{ef_cate}, #{ef_admin}, #{ef_sub}, #{ef_cont}, #{ef_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ef_original, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, ef_num, ef_cate, ef_admin, ef_sub, ef_cont, ef_file, ef_original, ef_date from (select * from ea_faq order by ef_num desc)) where rnum >= ((#{page2} - 1) * #{limit2} + 1) and rnum <= (#{page2} * #{limit2}) order by ef_num desc
mapper.update: update ea_faq set ef_cate=#{ef_cate}, ef_sub= #{ef_sub}, ef_cont = #{ef_cont}, ef_file=#{ef_file}, ef_original=#{ef_original}, ef_date=sysdate where ef_num = #{ef_num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from ea_faq where ef_sub like #{condition}

select * from (select rownum rnum, ef_num, ef_cate, ef_admin, ef_sub, ef_cont, ef_file, ef_original, ef_date from (select * from ea_faq where ef_sub like #{condition} order by ef_num desc)) where rnum >= ((#{page2} - 1) * #{limit2} + 1) and rnum <= (#{page2} * #{limit2}) order by ef_num desc
